reviews.review: spiel neu installiert und kann net starten was das für n rotz game

This game used to be great but every update makes it more frustrating to play. Free means cheaters and smurfs. New character models can be extremely abused and give an advantage to people. The game is becoming more and more riddled with problems and needs to be fixed before i would recommend someone to start playing.
Hella fun if you've got a 5 queue
Like the team play and don't like when other players are acting inappropriate. The goal should be to improve to a safe platform for everyone.

ne fakt ne, je to hra, ktera vam znicic zivot, taky cely vas pocitat, protize po jedne hre hrani s chetrem ho budetze chtit rozmrdat na kusy a vyhodit ho z okna. Takze tuto hru vrela nedoporucuji, a chtel bych namitnou, aby tato hra byla odsranena ze steamu a aby jste tam pridali staveni jako ve fortite. Bylo by to mnohem zabavnejsi a lidi by se v realu z toho zabijeli¨. Talze o mnophem vic demntu, kteri chteji hrat foprtine min. Uz opravdu nevim co mam dodat tak vam to jdfu odelsat, a dofam ze to uvidi co nejvice lidi, aby si tutu zkurvenou, vypatlanou hruNESTAHOVALI. Protoze jak uz jsem rekl, znici vam cely vas zivot..Takze jestli mi npisete, ze tato recenze je sprosta a nemuzete ji zvernit, tak na vas zhluboka seru a budu si o vas myslet ze jste jen banda zkurvenych kokotu, kteri jen sedi za pocitacem a vylepsuji tuto hru, ktera se naposledy alepon trosku graficky zlepisla tak cca pred 20lety ( tedy vlastne kdyz jste ji vynazly). To je vse tak ja jdu s pat s dobrym pocitem dobreho uprimneho komentare, Dekuji za laskavost, kterou mi nedate. Jo a jeste bych poprosil aby jste mi poslali carambit fade za 5000e. dekuji
They legit banned me for no reason
do not play this game it is not very fun

Probably one of the worst community ever! The only game where you can get kicked out of a game trying to improve and trying to play the damn game in a casual game. Nobody is born good, and people don't respect that.
